wiiremotej.event
Class WiiRemoteDiscoveredEvent

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      wiiremotej.event.WiiRemoteDiscoveredEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class WiiRemoteDiscoveredEvent
extends java.util.EventObject

An event for when a Wii Remote is discovered through a nonblocking method. Contains the number of the WiiRemote and the remote itself. Note that the getSource() method of a WiiRemoteDiscoveredEvent will return a meaningless object, as the source is a static class.

See Also:

WiiRemoteDiscoveredEvent

public WiiRemoteDiscoveredEvent(WiiRemote remote,
                                int number)
Creates a new WiiRemoteDiscoveredEvent from the given remote and number.

Parameters:
remote - the discovered remote.
number - the number of the remote discovered in the current find method, starting with 0.

Returns the discovered WiiRemote of this event.

getNumber

public int getNumber()
Returns the number of the discovered remote. The first remote is number 0.

Returns:
the number of the discovered remote.
